name: JumpStart Punk Punk Blitz
description:
JumpStart.com’s favorite furballs are invading the iPad™, iPod touch®, and iPhone®! Test your speed and skills as you race to match the squirming Punk Punks and rack up points in this addicting puzzle game.

Special Features:
-- Swirl: Create two matches at once to unlock a vortex and erase matches across the grid!
-- Bomb: Match four punks to create a bomb and wipe out the surrounding furballs!
-- Clock: Match five punks to earn a clock and a chance at bonus time!

Stuck? Just tap the hint button for a clue!

If you like the game please rate it 5 stars in iTunes to keep the updates coming.

Email us at AppComments@jumpstart.com with your suggestions and comments as we cannot respond to reviews. We love to hear your ideas and feedback!

Like us on Facebook for exclusive updates and offers.

http://www.facebook.com/JumpStart
